title: Product list item
description: The product list item is a list item representing a product selected by a customer with specific options and pricing that are for that usage context at a specific point of time and may differ from the product record. For example the product record contains details from the product information system that are consistent for all customers, where the product list item has the actual price offered to the customer at that time which may vary due to sales campaigns or seasonal pricing.

SKU.description: Stock Keeping Unit, a generally unique identifier for a product.

lineItemId.description: Line item identifier for this product.

category.description: The general product category this product was listed under when viewed or added to cart, e.g Men Clothing, Male Sportswear. This value is context specific. A product can appear under multiple categories depending on how it was found. Similar to Merchandising in Adobe Analytics.

findingMethod.description: The way the product was found by the visitor. "onSiteSearch", "review", "recommendation".

offerType.description: If there is a discount or price modification this attribute describes the class of offer. e.g coupon, clearance.

currency.description: The currency in which the amount is denominated.

basePriceAmount.description: The price listed before all discounts multiplied for a single unit of the product

quantity.description: The number of units the customer has indicated they require.

taxesAmount.description: The sum of all taxes for this productItem for all units of the quantity requested.

priceTotal.description: The sum (basePrice plus any custom costs per unit) multiplied by quantity plus taxesAmount less discountAmount.
